attributes.title: My grandpa was murdered from this app
attributes.review: I got this app, as a conservative republican, and I first got spammed with FAKE NEWS. It had me put in my number and got a bunch of calls and texts. I should have realized that was a RED FLAG, but then there were a bunch of wavers and terms and conditions. So I just clicked on all of them, then agreed to the Trump Administration to murder my grandfather, who happens to be 84 years old. And I didn’t realize until the next morning when he was found dead. It was all my fault just because of this app.

attributes.title: Disappointed😔
attributes.review: I was so excited to get more information about rallies and other great news from our president but all I got was lies, lies and more lies. I saw some information on this app that was credited from CNN. CAN YOU BELIEVE IT OF ALL THE NEWS SORCES. I didn’t see any information from Fox News whatsoever and that is the only credible new source. Also Biden was called “ a great candidate “ and apparently by President Trump himself, I doubt our amazing president would ever say such a thing. So that was more fake news. Do NOT and I repeat DO NOT get this app.

attributes.title: I have a giant crush on trump!
attributes.review:
Ok so i LOVE trump like i have an obsession with him i just cant get him off my mind and i downloaded this app just to see how AMAZING it is my love for him is as much as i love my moldy banana i just want to gobble it up thank you for your contribution to our country i just want to gobble that cake 🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂🎂 🍑🍑🍑🍑🍑🍑🍑🍑🍑🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆🍆

attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review: first off, not only do i not support this pig, i would like to address the fact that this app deserves to be where apps go to die. i hate this app with a burning passion. seeing the trump 2020 even being on my phone is APPALLING in and of itself. please apple store, do yourself a favor and delete this app off of your store, no one wants to see it. it instills a certain rage in me that i can not understand, but will certainly put into words against this racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic liar and predator’s app. thanks, xoxo, gen z ❤️

attributes.title: not good.
attributes.review: this app is completely unorganized and inappropriate. the “greeting” when you first open the app is a picture of a rotten Cheeto that has mold on top of it. this Cheeto is a homophobe, a racist, and more. he did the worst thing he could to handle a pandemic and didn’t make America ANY GREATER. to be honest, he made it worse. he also made many people suffer and he took away an app from everybody because he was butthurt. because of his RaLLiEs. please please please!! do NOT get this app or support this racist, homophobic, moldy orange. thank you.

attributes.title: Worst app!
attributes.review: When I tried to download the app my phone legit restarted! I came back to the App Store a few hours later in the hopes I could re download to see what our fabulous and not insane at all president has been planning, but  once I finally got it to download, every time I would go into the app it would close me out! And, when I finally was able to browse the app, it just kept glitching out! 10/10 would not recommend for download. I’m very disappointed.

attributes.title: WORST APP DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: this app is just awful. it took 5 hours to download even though i have lots of storage on my phone. AND when the app finally downloaded it kept crashing after i tried to open it! after hours and hours of opening the app and it crashing it started working. but the worst part hasn’t even come yet. when the app opened i saw a huge orange with tiny baby hands in front of the american flag! it was just disgusting. 0/5 would NOT recommend at all

attributes.title: very VERY bad app
attributes.review: if i could give a -1/5 star review i would. this app is absolutely REPULSIVE. the moment i opened this horribly developed app i had to sprint to the nearest trash can before i vomited over my whole room. after seeing this app i deleted it and light up some sage in order to get rid of the awful smell of cheetos my phone released while i was on this app. i don’t recommend downloading or even searching this app on the app store. have a blessed day to every one BUT the person who created this app. amen🙏🏼🙏🏼

attributes.title: Small ****
attributes.review: Obviously this app was made for people with tiny little hands because, me, a female with a ring size of 7, could not push any of the buttons! The only people who tried the app before it’s release must have been Donald Trump and his two sons. Maybe instead of nepotism (I’m sorry for the big word it means “letting your sons get better things than everyone else because they’re your sons”) you could try not being a jerk?? Thanks so much hope I never see u again 💗💗💗

attributes.title: Gen z
attributes.review: I’m sorry but it’s a really nice place for me haha was a really nice night and a good day to go swimming in my bed with my sister in my house so I’m going on a date with my friends house so I’ll just give y’all the money I can drive bye love you guys I’ll see y’all tomorrow bye love you guys I’ll come get it bye love you guys wanna see y’all in my office today right now I’m gonna is the cooking time for you to come home so y’all have to come home so I can do a little late so I’m going home I’ll just leave my house and then go.
